recent_episodes.title: why manifestation and vision boarding kept me broke and small
recent_episodes.description:
What does manifestation really mean? Why I don't believe in it and how it has change my life and business.

In this conversation go over the journey go from a broke single mom, cash advances, to having 2 successful businesses, savings and removing my broke ass lack mindset.

If you’ve ever wondered why you’re manifestation is not working all the time, this episode is for you!


You can follow celeste @celestethestylist on Instagram.
